headline: 3 Safe-and-Steady Industrials Stocks You Must Buy for Christmas
summary: Whether you see them or not, industrials businesses play a crucial part in our daily activities. But this role also comes with a demand profile tethered to the ebbs and flows of the broader economy. Thankfully, industrial end markets were stable over the past six months as the industry’s 9.6% gain has nearly mirrored the S&P 500.
